title: Shadowheart
content:
Mountain Pass (Rosymorn Monastery and Crèche Y'llek)

Put up Graffiti on Vlaakith's painting Persuade Sa'Varsh Kethk to leave the boy alone. Persuade Lae'zel to get out of the zaith'isk. Convince Varsh Ko'kuu to give you the egg and tell him you'll find another Crèche that is more forgiving. Tell Kith'rak Therezzyn you have the artifact but say "No". (This will trigger a fight) With Inquisitor Ch'r'ai W'wargaz, do not give the Artifact and then win the persuasion check with Lae'zel
